review: tetris effect is an awesome twist on a timeless classic  gorgeous visuals amazing music and the kind of vibe that just sucks you in my only gripe my eyes start hurting after a while but thats on me and my lessthanperfect eyesight not the game  whether you grab it on sale or at full price its absolutely worth it
this is a  good challenge on tetris if you can handle moving back grounds music and flashing lights it actually helps me stim some but its more difficult with out the colored tetriminos
probably the best version of tetris that will ever exist i didnt think i liked tetris but this is great music really adds a huge amount to it trippy

very good rendition of tetris  beautiful and challenging  really into the music  multiplayer is engaging and theres always someone on  sometimes you need to wait a good minute or two to be matched up but theres always someone playing  i give the game a solid a
beautiful and mesmerizing good game to play with when youre ignoring company in the house since its also a good viewing experiencing
most fun tetris game out there
this game is really good but i kinda wish there was an endless version the time stop mode
over all a really good game to play with friends or run solo but its but a rage bait simulator especially if you lose the level 3536

it is tetris so it is going to be great already the music and all the modes are what put it over the top for me this is the first tetris game since the gameboy that i really sunk any time into and i love it
tetris is perhaps the greatest game ever classic tetris can eat a sock im bad at it but god i love it i think about tetris when i go to sleep
banger soundtrack and good tetris game that has good graphics runs great on steam deck although i would not buy this at full price i would only buy this on sale
fun and very gorgeous game my only complaint is i wish it was longer you can beat this games journey mode in like an hour or less and for 40 thats pretty steep imo
euphoric masterpiece
this is a great game i do wish the multiplayer match making worked better
yes
a bit pricy ill admit and very few levels but its a very beautiful game i would only really get this if you play non stop tetris like me
very good visuals and very good soundtracks might take a while to adapt if youre used to playing with different handling values

overall the game is great even one with the best atmosphere in game if you have a powerful pc build and a nice display this game is one of those who put your graphics to a challenge and even if you dont have a powerful one the game is still very enjoyable and pleasant to the eyes a standing ovation for the creators
this game is for some fucking reason is too damn addictive my exams are litterally 5 days away and i cannot help myselfffffffffffffffffffff
i love tetris
shapes and colours the likes of which ive never seen
this game is amazing its like a music and rhythm game now i got six of my friends to buy it cause its that good

great game  there are so many modes not sure if there is endless mode there is mode 600 lines max where you cannot die and can chose constant speed it is better than lagged shit tetrisio in browser that is unplayable after line 20 this game is responsive and visuallyauditory pleasing it is absolutely awesome
i have played since i was a kid and have loved this game since and this version is so calming
tetris wit new bangin chunes
tetris meets rez  there is nothing at all wrong with this
cried when i finished journey mode the first time genuinely beautiful experience which sounds crazy for a tetris title but its true actually a masterpiece
good

when i first got this game i first questioned am i gonna continue this game yes definitely did  i dont know if its me but i achieved level 50 faster than i ever thought thankfully it wouldnt take years and hours of game time to do it but this game is a huge help on your tetris skills whether it is speed and logic  i gotta say i also enjoy doing fun challenges  httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvdcvkmuy4qee
great tetris engine with chill vibes it has good multiplayer modes a fun single player mode good vr support an amazing soundtrack and some unique mechanics a must buy for a tetris fan
its a great version of tetris as long as you like tetris

on top of being an excellent tetris game the tetris effect is a transcendently beautiful experience literally everyone alive ought to play it they should give you a free copy when you walk into a therapists office
gg
this game is worth the 40 which i would never i think i would say for a tetris game its super beautiful and is really addictive its really breathtaking
what a beautiful and calming game
beautiful

yes its just tetris but in vr its a mandatory experience   something about the stunning visuals and the great soundtrack combine together in vr to create this breathtaking experience that is impossible to replicate on a screen i know that its still just tetris but if you get the chance to try it do it im talking eye opening religious experience type of stuff must try
such a good game puts a fun musical twist on tetris with visually pleasing effects
nice to entertain
great change of the classic tetris got nothing else to say
one of the best tetris experiences this has it all
a version of tetris so demanding it turns my steam deck into a jet turbine recommend heavily but get on a sale
love it
never would have imaged the classic game of tetris could be improved amazing game with awesome music very creative beautiful and fun
why does this game have a vr mode
its fun

well its tetris graphically nice and some extra game modes too although either im getting old or they benchmarked the score ratings against tetris gods because in most game modes i struggle to get anything higher than c rank
no thought only brick
i decided to try this game years ago because in 2020 or 2021 i got game pass and was bored this game is really good its both a game and an experience it gave tetris an amazing new look
awesome game great graphics
it has classic mode so old geezers like me can relieve their youth love it
this game makes you happy
probably the best tetris game ive ever played single players great multiplayers great and the vr aspect is awesome

perhaps a little expensive for tetris but i feel i got my moneys worth  what can i say its tetris the big selling point here are the visuals which im still not tired of 90 hours later im a sucker for adaptive music and this game really shines in that department grab it on sale if you want to get it then have fun
temtris

wow i am very impressed with this game    i do not wear headphones normally when playing games i do recommend for this game the little extra sounds and music really make it enjoyable   very nice game and music is reactive to what you are doing on screen
i love tetris
tetri yeah
this is my first steam review and frankly this game deserves it its tetris but beautiful and damn near emotional play this game at least once
i love tetris in general the fact how theres different types of beautiful tunes in this game and the speed level well it makes it 10xs better good to release stress from work and unwind
dope music
i love tits
this is transcendental and meditative tetris for the soul wow
god i fucking love tetris
effectively awesome

its a bit pricey for a tetris game but it the game is just so mesmerizing and beutiful with the adaptive music gameplay with tetris in the background it feels like you are being ascended into heaven or hell depending on which level you play
best game ever

i like tetris and beatsaber this one gives the vibe of both and the pvp is fun aginst friends but sometimes when you play online you come up aginst someone who feels just like a robot who build at inhuman speeds but al in al fun game
very good
good old tetris with lots of extras very nice

not only tetsuya mizuguchis magnum opus but perhaps the greatest iteration of tetris ever made an absolute tour de force of hdr play this game on a displayhdr 1000 rated panel oled miniled with local dimming for a facemelting spiritual experience unfathomably beautiful not everyday when a tetris game reduces you to tears
worth the 500 vr headset
having a game not open fullscreen on minimal brightness and having to remap every single control to standard controls made me not even want to play it
nice modes nice music tetris
